thread.title: CU-Boulder leading new drone project to study severe storms (University of Colorado at Boulder)
thread.title_full: CU-Boulder leading new drone project to study severe storms (University of Colorado at Boulder) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: CU-Boulder leading new drone project to study severe storms (University of Colorado at Boulder)
text: ( Source : University of Colorado at Boulder ) The University of Colorado Boulder is the lead institution on a $1.9 million federal grant to develop autonomous aerial robotic systems that will enable new atmospheric science applications,
